an4.180:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bhoganagare viharati ānandacetiye.
an4.180:1.7: taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an4.180:1.8: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
an4.180:2.3: ‘sammukhā metaṃ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ—
an4.180:2.4: ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo, idaṃ satthusāsanan’ti.
an4.180:2.5: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṃ neva abhinanditabbaṃ nappaṭikkositabbaṃ.
an4.180:2.6: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṃ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni, vinaye sandassetabbāni.
an4.180:2.7: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni na ceva sutte otaranti na vinaye sandissanti, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ:
an4.180:2.8: ‘addhā idaṃ na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa;
